settings.heading: Spread Happiness
settings.subheading: For every purchased pair, we donate a new pair to a child in need

settings.head_not_mob_text: Spread Happiness: When you buy a pair, we donate a pair.

settings.text: Shop our extremely comfortable collection for little kids (ages 4-8 years).

settings.title: Aquila
settings.text: A striking monochrome sneaker that combines sleek design and bold accents with the ultimate comfort.

settings.title: Cygnus
settings.text: Crafted with premium materials. Blends comfort and classic design to create a timeless feel.

settings.title: Pavo
settings.text: A captivating blend of bold designs and vibrant hues brings a playful and unforgettable style.

settings.heading: Easy Closures
settings.text: Easy closure with a hook-and-loop strap to create a wide opening for easy-on and easy-off. A no-tie lacing system to keep them active and on the go.

settings.heading: Super Cushion
settings.text: Super cushioned mid-sole with a grippy rubber outsole to ensure that the spring in those feet stay consistent all day long.

settings.heading: Heel Tab
settings.text: Heel tab to help little ones with easy sliding their feet into the shoes.

settings.heading: Protecting the Play
settings.text: Added reinforcements to help with wear and tear and protect those precious toes.

settings.subheading: Discover what makes our shoes special
settings.title: Explore the Tech

settings.heading: Premium Insole and Lining
settings.text: A 100% textile lining and cushioned insole.

settings.heading: Premium Uppers
settings.text: Soft premium uppers to help those feet stay comfortable and fresh all day long.

settings.heading: Super plush
settings.text: All our shoes feature a super cushioned midsole with a rubber outsole to ensure that the spring in those feet stay consistent all day long. Our 100% textile lining and a cushioned insole adds to that walking on cloud feeling all-day for those all-day adventures.

settings.heading: Protect the play
settings.text: For our kids range, we have paid special attention to protection. Our shoes feature a toe cap and added reinforcements to help with wear and tear and protect those precious toes.

settings.heading: Easy closure
settings.text: Our Aquila and Pavo styles come with a no-tie lacing system to keep the kids active and on the go. The hook-and-loop strap created a wide opening for easy-on and easy-off and the heel tab allows easy sliding of feet into the shoes

settings.heading: A striking design
settings.text: If you prefer classics and laces, check out Cygnus. Designed with both functionality and style in mind, the Cygnus series provide a secure fit and extra support. Perfect for active little ones on the go.

Try our Subscription Box.

Receive a box every few months. Swap styles & sizes across boxes.

settings.title: Easy sizing up
settings.text: Kids aged 4-8 years typically need a new pair every few months. Our subscription ensures a perfect fit, always.

settings.title: Less stress
settings.text: Don't scramble on a Sunday evening when you discover your kids have outgrown or wrecked their shoes.

settings.title: Save $
settings.text: Save $21 or more on each pair when you subscribe. No hidden fees. Pause or cancel anytime.

settings.title: More perks
settings.text: Earn more reward points when you subscribe. Unlock exclusive styles and a longer return period.

• Fresh styles added frequently: Choose from our growing collection of shoes. We are launching with three designs that cover your child's needs and will keep adding more.

  • Plans for every family: Select how many pairs your child needs and set the delivery frequency. Change preferences as needed.
We have partnered with Soles4Souls, a top US non-profit organization, to donate a new pair for every pair you purchase!

Your child's gently used shoes can find new life around the world, creating economic opportunities and protecting the planet.

With our prepaid shipping labels, donating is effortless. Help bring change.
Choose from our growing collection of shoes. We are starting with three designs that cover your child's needs. New designs added every month.
A striking monochrome sneaker that combines sleek design and bold accents with the ultimate comfort.
The Pavo sneaker line creates a striking display of vibrant hues and playful patterns to bring bold designs to our comfortable shoes.
Cygnus is crafted with premium materials, and blends comfort and style to create a timeless collection of classic shoes for kids.

settings.heading: Our Mission
settings.text:
To help children everywhere truly shine.

That's why when you purchase a pair, we donate a new pair to a child who needs it.

But selling great kids footwear is only the first step. Follow us on Instagram to see the change we hope to bring in this world.

settings.heading: We believe
settings.text:
That lifeâ€™s greatest privilege and joy is to serve our children, helping them grow into responsible and caring human beings.
Follow us on Instagram for city guides for children's activities.

settings.heading: We help
settings.text:
Parents become their best selves for their children.

Follow us on Instagram for parenting tips that you can use.

settings.heading: Parent powered!
settings.text:
Started by parents who wanted to do better for their kids. We quit our corporate jobs to build a socially responsible business.

We are small, but full of heart.

settings.title: What age group of kids do you serve?
settings.answer: We currently have shoes for little kids aged 4-8 years, with sizes from 10.5 to 3. We plan to add new sizes in near future.

settings.title: How does the subscription work?
settings.answer:
Our subscription ships fresh pairs of kids' shoes to your doorstep every few months.

When starting the subscription, decide how many pairs your child needs and how often. When your next subscription is a few weeks out, we will alert you to confirm the next pair's pair style and size.

settings.title: Is this a mystery box subscription?
settings.answer: No. You can choose the shoes your child needs.

settings.title: Do you plan to add more styles?
settings.answer: Yes, we will soon add more styles as we scale up. Our launch collection has 3 styles that cover your child's every day needs - from activewear to fashionwear.

settings.title: How good are your shoes?
settings.answer:
We spent over a year carefully researching, finalizing, and testing multiple manufacturers to finalize a factory that can produce very high quality shoes.

But don't take our word for it. Have your child try out our shoes.

settings.title: How do you pronounce Taare?
settings.answer: Taare is pronounced 'Taa-Ray'. It means stars in the Hindi language.
